TopicTitle: How to use Engineer to measure launch efficiency?

Articles.Content: Simple question really (which means probably not simple at all). A standard Kerbin launch is supposed to be around 4500-4700 dv. Engineer displays dv capabilities of a rocket for both vacuum and atmospheric. What number, or ratio of the two numbers, should I be looking at when designing/evaluating?
For stages burning low in the atmosphere (<10-15km) use the atmosphere number, for everything else use the vacuum number.
